Description:
Company Background Enrichers Private Limited (EPL) is one of the leading financial brokerage companies operating in Pakistan and a Corporate Member of PMEX.
EPL provides round-the-clock client assistance through our Centralised Trading Unit and strives to add value to our clients through customized, transparent, and knowledge-based services. 
We acknowledge that the rise in global financial markets and diversified investment options have further strengthened the prosperity of the Financial Brokerage Industry. Therefore, EPL utilizes technological innovations introduced by fintech and modern AI-based trading software to enhance its trading capabilities and provide personalized investment strategies to its customers. 
EPL is an equal employment opportunity provider. 
As a strong proponent of SDG goals, we strongly adhere to Goal 3, i.e., good health and well-being, and Goal 8, i.e., decent work and economic growth.
We truly value diversity and inclusivity and strive to work on employees' professional development. Skills
Skills: Job  Responsibilities of Business Development Officer/Management Trainee Officer

Implementation of Lead Generation Strategy 
Ability to give compelling presentations showcasing our financial brokerage services 
Implementation of strategic funneling approach
Prospect Relations Management 
Skillful Negotiations
Tenacious Follow-up
Leveraging Network

Minimum 16 years of Graduation
0-2 years of professional experience, ideally within a related industry.
Strong presentation skills 
Interpersonal skills
Effective networking abilities
Self-motivated and target-driven
Strong verbal and written communication skills

Financial Growth by the high commission.
Long-lasting career and professional development.
Free trainings on a regular basis.
Certifications.
Lunch/Dinner.
Trips & rewards.
Annual, sick, casual, Hajj/Umrah, and Marriage Leaves.
